author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Markdig.Signed](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig) from 0.15.7 to 0.17.0.
Changelog *Sourced from [Markdig.Signed's changelog](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/blob/master/changelog.md).* > ## 0.17.0 (10 May 2019) > - Update to latest CommonMark specs 0.29 ([(PR [#327](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/327))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/327)) > - Add `AutoLinkOptions` with `OpenInNewWindow`, `UseHttpsForWWWLinks` ([(PR [#327](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/327))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/327)) > - Add `DisableHeadings` extension method to `MarkdownPipelineBuilder` ([(PR [#327](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/327))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/327)) > - Drop support for netstandard1.1 and Portable Class Libraries ([(PR [#319](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/319))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/319)) > - Allow non-ASCII characters in url domain names ([(PR [#319](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/319))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/319)) > - Add better support for youtu.be link ([(PR [#336](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/336))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/336)) > - Fix backsticks in Markdown.Normalize ([(PR [#334](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/334))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/334)) > > ## 0.16.0 (25 Feb 2019) > - Improve performance of emoji-abbreviation parser ([(PR [#305](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/305))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/305)) > - Change output for math extension to use a rendering more compatible with existing Math JS libraries ([(PR [#311](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/311))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/311)) > - Improve emphasis parser to allow to match more than 2 characters ([(PR [#301](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/301))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/301)) > - Output attached attributes to a `` from a table row ([(PR [#300](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/300))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/300)) > - Improve MarkdownObject.Descendants() search ([(PR [#288](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/288))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/288)) > - Allow to pass a `MarkdownParserContext` ([(PR [#285](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/285))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/285)) >
Commits - [`ea13b33`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/ea13b33f1a4fe1e12c078d485a3bf4dac46e0947) Allow to tag with version without v prefix - [`9b2ec2e`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/9b2ec2e2e57b04f60d2a1eebf169df4e68747591) Bump to 0.17.0 - [`d8dffc2`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d8dffc28b48c949cceeb41fd9647a664e7ea1d23) Merge pull request [#336](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/336) from FranklinWhale/youtube-enhancements - [`0735042`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/0735042599f20c57d63f5031b7101f5571cc0b59) Merge pull request [#334](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/334) from OpportunityLiu/master - [`d1f99cd`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d1f99cdb69edec5439d87147d937c733559c688c) Add test cases and URL escaping - [`d0a2ae2`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d0a2ae2b502c6530fc5af6a0842771fa4681be3a) Code formatting change - [`dd4d1b3`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/dd4d1b349f14b5b5819cf133f1efdb47dbc70177) lf as line ending - [`e33281b`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/e33281b8aea55334cd24d643ac2697d7ed29244a) optimize - [`50d4256`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/50d42560da9710d89da8e0f33789ef82a643e3c3) Use null-conditional operator - [`a1e96d7`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/a1e96d717b6e630abd3c288c6a9d368d9dc596b1) Correct lambda - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/compare/v0.15.7...0.17.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.15.7&new-version=0.17.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.15.7&new-version=0.17.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body: OK, I won't notify you about version 0.17.x again, unless you re-open this PR or update to a 0.17.x release yourself.

title: Build(deps): Bump Markdig.Signed from 0.15.7 to 0.17.0
